snippet: A Pew Research Center report released Thursday found that nearly one in three Americans mothers last year said they would prefer a full-time job, up from one in five in 2007.
abstract: Pew Research Center report finds that nearly one in three Americans mothers in 2012 said they would prefer a full-time job, up from one in five in 2007.
lead_paragraph: A Pew Research Center report released Thursday found that nearly one in three Americans mothers last year said they would prefer a full-time job, up from one in five in 2007.

headline.main: Study Shows Increase in Mothers Who Say They Want Full-Time Work
headline.print_headline: Study Shows Increase In Mothers Who Say They Want Full-Time Work
